title: The best films to watch at the cinema this week – and what to avoid
text:
This week’s cinema includes Joker, the controversial anti-hero film starring Joaquin Phoenix. It’s accompanied by a blaze of controversy and difficult publicity – but it’s a must-see event.

Judy sees Renée Zellweger relive the last days of Miss Garland on the London stage.

Good Posture is a sharp literary comedy about a frosty English novelist and her aimless young American house-guest.

Finally, the London Film Festival continues, with highlights including Knives Out, Le Mans ’66, Rocks and The Irishman.

Joker ★★★★☆
description: This week’s cinema includes Joker, the controversial anti-hero film starring Joaquin Phoenix.
